title.en: Mr. Kurose’s a Beast When He Takes His Clothes Off. Validating Sex That I Want to Enjoy and Accomplish

altTitles.ja: 黒瀬くんは脱いだら野獣。満たして突きたい肯定エッチ

description.en: "It's so cute how you're begging. Does it feel good?" He teases her, makes her come, and loves her thoroughly. "I can't believe that Mr. Kurose who looks like such a messy man, is so sweet and carnivorous when it comes to me...!! Sawa is an office worker who has a complex because of her monolids and her plain face, suited for the Heian period. Feeling the need to live up to the expectations of her older sisters who doted on her, she aims to marry into money. And her target is the son of the company CEO! However, Kurose gets in her way every time she tries to approach the heir... But right then, a certain event led to Kurose seeing her face without makeup on!! Yet, he still called her "cute" after seeing her true face. Even though he was supposed to be her natural enemy, before she knew it, she started following him with her eyes. "Your heart, your body, your face... I’ll undress them all." He caresses her sloppily, as if exposing the deepest parts of her. "No! If this keeps going, it's going to overflow...!!"
